caption.p: Geographical distribution of mtDNA COICOII haplotypes (1175â€‰bp fragment) of BMSB in native countries in the current study, ( a) China, and ( b) Japan. Provinces where BMSB was collected from are shaded in grey. COI-COII combined haplotypes were formed by combing COI and COII haplotypes. The size of pie is proportional to the frequency of haplotypes. Each colour represents a different haplotype. The figure was generated using Tableau 2019 ( https://www.tableau.com/) [ 34]
